channel.title: Aiden Nelson's Personal Website that is Under Construction

item.title: A Miscellaneous Page for Miscellaneous Things
item.description: I have added a few things to this website. They can be found on the Misc. (Miscellaneous Things 📎) page.

item.title: Films and Videos 🎥
item.description: This is a list of films and videos I have worked on in the past for fun and in collaboration with close friends. 🚌 Innovation that Excites 🌲 How to Plant a Tree 🐘 Elephants 🎲 Dice Anger ❤️ So Relatable

item.title: Meal Manifesto 📜
item.description: ⚠️ A note to readers: This document is written by Aiden for his own use as an individual, therefore general usability is not guaranteed, especially for those that are not Aiden. Document Sections 📕 Document Organization 📗 Purpose Statement 📘 Term Definitions 👤 Meals for Self 👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 Feeding the Crowds 🎩 Fancy Food 🍪 Lavish Treats 💫 Miscellaneous Foodstuff 📚 Recipe Appendix Document Organization This document is divided into several sections.

item.title: Miscellaneous Things 📎
item.description: 🍽 Recipies I use 🎥 Short films/videos 📚 Book reviews ♟ Board game reviews
